title: A discourse concerning liberty of conscience In which are contain'd proposalls, about what liberty in this kind is now politically expedient to be given, and severall reasons to shew how much the peace and welfare of the nation is concern'd therein. By R.T.
author: Pett, Peter, Sir, 1630-1699.
publisher: printed for Nathaniel Brook, and are to be sold at his shop at the Angel in Cornhill,
